name: Baked Yam and Cranberry Casserole
ingredients: 6 sweet potatoes, peeled and thickly sliced
instructions: Add apple butter, apple juice and maple syrup.
Cook stirring frequently until heated thoroughly, 5-10 minutes.
In a greased 9 x 13 pan layer yams, cranberries and sauce.
Repeat layers until all ingredients are used.
Bake covered, at 350 for 1 hour until yams and cranberries are fork tender.
